videos.description: Sagaba Konate displays beautiful post moves, getting the turnaround hook shot to fall in the first half.
videos.headline: West Virginia's Konate dominates in the paint

videos.description: Teddy Allen soars through the air to get the acrobatic layup to drop for the Mountaineers.
videos.headline: West Virginia's Allen attacks the rim

videos.description: Teddy Allen steals it on the defense end and runs the floor finishing with the and-1 layup.
videos.headline: West Virginia's Allen turns defense to offense

videos.description: Lamont West cuts to the basket and fully extends to throw down the one-handed jam in the second half.
videos.headline: West Virginia's West rocks the rim

videos.description: Xavier Sneed drills a 3-pointer from the corner to pull his team within 4 points of West Virginia late in the second half.
videos.headline: Kansas State's Sneed sinks corner 3

videos.description: Led by freshman Teddy Allen's 22-point performance, the Mountaineers handle Kansas State, 77-69.
videos.headline: West Virginia wins 13th consecutive game
